text: "Save Me" is a 1980 song by Queen and was taken from their 8th studio album The Game. It went to number 6 in the Netherlands, number 7 in Norway, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Belgium, number 31 in Italy and number 42 in Germany. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Queen (band) songs
title: Save Me (Queen song)
